column4: Does anyone know why when I, in OpenOffice.org type "=(21,0-(B4*2))*(29,7-(B4*2))*B4" it changes it to: "=('21,0'-(B4*2))*('29,7'-(B4*2))*B4" AND gives me the wrong answer?
Danuel: You don't, you use sudo in terminal :)
yes i know, but I think you have to be part of the adm and admin groups to do that
